text: Linda Hamilton (born September 26 1956) is an American television and movie actress. She was born in Salisbury, Maryland. She played Sarah Connor in The Terminator (1984), Terminator 2: Judgment Day (1991) and Terminator: Dark Fate (2019). She also starred in the movies King Kong Lives (1986) and Dante's Peak (1997), as well as in the television series Beauty and the Beast (1987–1989), Chuck (2011–2012) and several other television programs. == Other websites == * * * Category:People from Salisbury, Maryland Category:Actors from Maryland Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:1956 births Category:Living people
title: Linda Hamilton
